channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-8621] More log edits; we log too much
item.description: Running 0.95.1 candidate on cluster, I notice we are logging too much. Here is an edit of the logs.
item.summary: More log edits; we log too much

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Changed some logging to trace, changed some logging so only log if something to say.

Integrated in HBase-TRUNK #4143 (See https://builds.apache.org/job/HBase-TRUNK/4143/)
HBASE-8621 More log edits; we log too much (Revision 1486291)

Result = SUCCESS
stack :
Files :

  • /hbase/trunk/hbase-client/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/client/ClientScanner.java
